title: Beirut Falafel
summary_of_comments: Praised for falafel and vegan chicken, great crunch, affordable and popular for lunch.

title: Ballsy Tea
summary_of_comments: All-natural, fully vegan menu; unique flavours loved by everyone.

title: The Chippo Hotel (Mama B's Bistro)
summary_of_comments: Australia’s first vegan pub; praised for value and plant-based innovation.

title: Flyover Fritterie
summary_of_comments: All-vegetarian menu, raved-about fritters.

title: Tian Ci Vegan
summary_of_comments: Great technique, quality produce.

title: Golden Lotus
summary_of_comments: Famous for vegan Vietnamese laksa, loved for variety.

title: Don Fred
summary_of_comments: Consistently praised, high online rating.

title: Green Gourmet
summary_of_comments: Standout for weekend vegan yum cha.

title: Veggie House
summary_of_comments: Fusion menu, lively local following.

title: Chatkazz
summary_of_comments: Huge range, authentic flavours.

title: Kindred
summary_of_comments: Inventive, highly rated veg-focused set menus.

title: Vin Fafe
summary_of_comments: Tofu banh mi described as best in Sydney.

title: An Lac
summary_of_comments: Known for variety, authentic flavour.

title: An Nien
summary_of_comments: Worth the journey for vegan diners.

title: Tan Binh Mnh
summary_of_comments: Frequent recommendation for vegan banh mi.

title: Pizza Madre
summary_of_comments: Creative and delicious pizzas, great for veggies.

title: Barzaari
summary_of_comments: Vegetarian-strong menu, chef-led creativity.

title: Jambo Jambo
summary_of_comments: Unique, very vegetarian friendly, group share platters.

title: Grana
summary_of_comments: Impressive pasta, vegan-antipasti options.

title: Lestari Resto
summary_of_comments: Recommended for diverse plant-based options.

title: Yunn
summary_of_comments: Celebrated for creative veg cooking techniques.

title: Xinjiang Handmade Noodles
summary_of_comments: Vegetarian options praised for texture and flavour.

title: Maydanoz
summary_of_comments: Full veggie menu, high-end modern Turkish.

title: Spice Temple
summary_of_comments: High-end group dining, flexible vegan options.

title: Gigi's
summary_of_comments: Classic vegan pizza, busy and reliable.

title: I Should Be Souvlaki
summary_of_comments: Famed for authenticity, excellent for vegan takes on souvlaki.

title: Comeco
summary_of_comments: Creative vegan sushi and traditional riceballs.

title: Yellow
summary_of_comments: Innovative, ever-changing tasting menus.

title: Little Turtle
summary_of_comments: Thai vegan modern twist, signature rolls and desserts.

title: Vandal Taqueria
summary_of_comments: Experimental vegan Mexican, popular banquets.

title: Kimusabi
summary_of_comments: Vegan/vegetarian sushi banquet, creative and high quality.

title: Mother Chu’s Vegetarian Kitchen
summary_of_comments: Iconic, family vibe, comprehensive menu.

title: Loving Hut
summary_of_comments: Extensive vegan menu with Vietnamese classics.

title: Two Chaps
summary_of_comments: Cafe vibe, inventive veggie menu, loved for dinner degustation.

title: Bootleg Italian
summary_of_comments: Reputation for vegan degustation, mixed but mostly positive.

title: Bentley Restaurant & Bar
summary_of_comments: Special occasion, high-end service.

title: Pendolino
summary_of_comments: Upscale, accommodates vegan with set menu.

title: The Malaya
summary_of_comments: Classics veganized, loyal following.

title: Yulli's
summary_of_comments: Fun, inventive tasting plates, raved-about desserts.

title: Flora
summary_of_comments: Newer on the scene, praised for freshness.

title: Mark & Vinny’s
summary_of_comments: Noted for pasta, inventive cocktails.

title: Bella Brutta
summary_of_comments: Famed for crust and sauce, vegan cheese option available.

title: Alpha
summary_of_comments: Boutique-style, generous portions, vegan set menus on request.

title: Apollo
summary_of_comments: Multiple set menus, can accommodate vegans.

title: Cafe Sydney
summary_of_comments: Fine dining, vegan options with views.

title: Untied
summary_of_comments: Vegan crowd favourite, lively bar.

title: Quay
summary_of_comments: Book ahead for high-end vegan experience.

title: Poly
summary_of_comments: Menu changes often, caters for vegan diners.

title: Yellow Deli
summary_of_comments: Classic, but be aware of unique cult/ownership context.

title: Viand
summary_of_comments: Praised for creative fine dining.

title: Otto Ristorante
summary_of_comments: Waterfront Italian, vegan banquet available.

title: Metisse
summary_of_comments: Fine dining, vegan tasting menu on request.

title: China Doll
summary_of_comments: Fine dining Asian, vegan dishes flexible.

title: Mother Chu's Delight
summary_of_comments: Old-school vegetarian favourite, loyal following.

title: Bootleg Italian
summary_of_comments: Popular for vegan fine dining, mixes reviews on noise.

title: Gigi Pizzeria
summary_of_comments: Pioneer in Sydney's vegan pizza, often busy, always vegan.
